text: Three Days in Moscow () is a 1974 Soviet comedy movie directed by Aleksey Korenev and starring Semyon Morozov, Natalya Varley, Stanislav Sadalskiy, Valentina Sperantova, Anatoly Vedyonkin. == Other websites == * Category:1974 comedy movies Category:Soviet comedy movies Category:Movies set in Moscow Category:Movies directed by Aleksey Korenev
title: Three Days in Moscow
